name: libdivecomputer
description: Library for communication with various dive computers

repo.name: libdivecomputer
repo.description: Libdivecomputer is a cross-platform and open source library for communication with dive computers from various manufacturers.

readme.summary: Clear purpose but completely lacks usage examples, API documentation, and any practical guidance beyond basic installation.
readme.top_issue: No code examples or usage documentation - users cannot learn how to actually use the library after installing it

security.summary: The provided libdivecomputer code appears to be generally secure with no major injection risks or secrets exposure, but could benefit from additional input validation and error handling.

common_complaints: New device model support delays (Suunto Ocean, Shearwater Swift GPS)
Hardware compatibility and authentication issues with some devices
Limited API methods for dive access
Connection timeouts and data transfer failures
praise_themes: Appreciation for library maintenance and community support
Recognition as valuable resource for dive community
Users willing to help collect device information
sentiment.summary: Moderately healthy community with engaged users seeking device support, but frustrated by delays in new model implementation and occasional hardware compatibility issues.

communication.summary: The maintainer's responses are clear, helpful, and patient, with a good level of technical depth. They encourage new contributors effectively.

concerns: No commits in past 6 months despite last commit being recent (Jan 9, 2026)
8 open issues with no resolution activity
Zero closed issues in past 6 months indicates no active issue triage
No merged PRs in past 6 months shows no development activity
No active contributors in past 6 months
Unknown last release date suggests release process may be dormant
positive_signals: Recent commit activity on Jan 9, 2026 shows some recent work
Repository still exists and is accessible
maintenance.summary: libdivecomputer appears stale with no meaningful maintenance activity over the past 6 months despite a recent commit, indicated by zero issue closures, no merged PRs, and no active contributors.

analysis_summary.doc_summary: The documentation is clear about the package's purpose and installation, but lacks examples, configuration details, and troubleshooting information.
concerns: Low number of merged PRs compared to open issues
No commits in the last month
Docs: Lack of examples and quick start guide to help new users understand how to use the library
High bus factor risk (91% from top contributor)
highlights: Recent commit activity within the past year
